name: Taco Village
description:
You are alone in a village... well just your house. Everybody had moved to the city except you. You need to improve your village! So drag the good items (health, transport, work and technology)  into your village to collect them and level up  it! However, there are bad items that decrease the quality of life, take them away!

Good luck! We hope you enjoy it!

This game was developed in the JamToday of Granada 2020 by the Pipelines group.

I was one of the programmer. The topic was depopulation.
